languages.text: "Чудно. Я еще не встречала человека, чьи речи были бы столь дымчаты и бесцветны. Вы словно диковинный зверь, что меняет свой окрас в зависимости от окружения. Будет интересно понаблюдать за вами".

traits.locale_text: "Чудно. Я еще не встречала человека, чьи речи были бы столь дымчаты и бесцветны. Вы словно диковинный зверь, что меняет свой окрас в зависимости от окружения. Будет интересно понаблюдать за вами".

languages.text: "How peculiar. I've never met anyone whose words appeared so smoky and hueless. You're like an exotic beast that changes its colour based on its surroundings. Observing you will be interesting."
languages.original_text: "Чудно. Я еще не встречала человека, чьи речи были бы столь дымчаты и бесцветны. Вы словно диковинный зверь, что меняет свой окрас в зависимости от окружения. Будет интересно понаблюдать за вами".

traits.locale_text: "How peculiar. I've never met anyone whose words were so smoky and hueless. You're like an exotic beast that changes its colour based on its surroundings. Observing you will be interesting."
"How peculiar. I've never met anyone whose words were so smoky and hueless. You're like an exotic beast that changes its colour based on its surroundings. Observing you will be interesting."
"How peculiar. I've never met anyone whose words appeared so smoky and hueless. You're like an exotic beast that changes its colour based on its surroundings. Observing you will be interesting."
"How peculiar. I've never met anyone whose words appeared so smoky and hueless. You're like an exotic beast that changes its colour based on its surroundings. Observing you will be interesting."
"How peculiar. I've never met anyone whose words appeared so smoky and hueless. You're like an exotic beast that changes its colour based on its surroundings. Observing you will be interesting."

languages.text: 「なんて不思議なんでしょう。言葉がこれほど煙に満ちて色が無い人には会ったことがありません。あなたは環境に応じて色を変える異国の獣のような方ね。観察すると面白そうです」
languages.original_text: "How peculiar. I've never met anyone whose words appeared so smoky and hueless. You're like an exotic beast that changes its colour based on its surroundings. Observing you will be interesting."

traits.locale_text: 「なんて不思議なんでしょう。言葉がこれほど煙に満ちて色が無い人には会ったことがありません。あなたは環境に応じて色を変える異国の獣のような方ね。観察すると面白そうです」

languages.text: “真是奇怪，我从来没见过谁的言语能如此烟雾缭绕，空洞无色。你就像一只奇异的野兽，会根据周围的环境改变自己的颜色。观察你一定会很有趣。”
languages.original_text: "How peculiar. I've never met anyone whose words appeared so smoky and hueless. You're like an exotic beast that changes its colour based on its surroundings. Observing you will be interesting."

traits.locale_text: “真是奇怪，我从来没见过谁的言语能如此烟雾缭绕，空洞无色。你就像一只奇异的野兽，会根据周围的环境改变自己的颜色。观察你一定会很有趣。”

languages.text: «Qué peculiar. Nunca había conocido a nadie cuyas palabras emitieran tanto humo y tan poco olor. Es como una bestia exótica que cambia de color según su entorno. Me interesaría observarle de cerca».
languages.original_text: "How peculiar. I've never met anyone whose words appeared so smoky and hueless. You're like an exotic beast that changes its colour based on its surroundings. Observing you will be interesting."

traits.locale_text: «Qué peculiar. Nunca había conocido a nadie cuyas palabras emitieran tanto humo y tan poco olor. Es como una bestia exótica que cambia de color según su entorno. Me interesaría observarle de cerca».

languages.text: « Comme c'est étrange. C'est la première fois que je rencontre quelqu'un dont les paroles sont aussi nébuleuses et dénuées de couleur. Vous êtes comme ces créatures exotiques qui changent de teinte en fonction de leur environnement. Je vais prendre un grand plaisir à vous observer. »
languages.original_text: "How peculiar. I've never met anyone whose words appeared so smoky and hueless. You're like an exotic beast that changes its colour based on its surroundings. Observing you will be interesting."

traits.locale_text: « Comme c'est étrange. C'est la première fois que je rencontre quelqu'un dont les paroles sont aussi nébuleuses et dénuées de couleur. Vous êtes comme ces créatures exotiques qui changent de teinte en fonction de leur environnement. Je vais prendre un grand plaisir à vous observer. »

languages.text: "Sehr eigenartig. Mir ist noch nie jemand begegnet, dessen Worte so vernebelt und farblos waren. Ihr seid wie ein exotisches Tier, das seine Farbe je nach Umgebung wechselt. Euch zu beobachten, dürfte interessant werden."
languages.original_text: "How peculiar. I've never met anyone whose words appeared so smoky and hueless. You're like an exotic beast that changes its colour based on its surroundings. Observing you will be interesting."

traits.locale_text: "Sehr eigenartig. Mir ist noch nie jemand begegnet, dessen Worte so vernebelt und farblos waren. Ihr seid wie ein exotisches Tier, das seine Farbe je nach Umgebung wechselt. Euch zu beobachten, dürfte interessant werden."

languages.text: "Pek tuhaf. Sözleri bu denli sisli ve tondan yoksun kimseyle tanışmamıştım. Ortamına göre renk değiştiren egzotik bir yaratık gibisin. Seni gözlemlemek ilginç olacak."
languages.original_text: "How peculiar. I've never met anyone whose words appeared so smoky and hueless. You're like an exotic beast that changes its colour based on its surroundings. Observing you will be interesting."

traits.locale_text: "Pek tuhaf... Sözleri bu denli gölgeli ve renksiz görünen kimseyle tanışmamıştım. Muhitine göre rengini değiştiren egzotik bir canavar gibisin. Seni gözlemlemek ilginç olacak."
